name: Battlegear
description:
A very short game created to make fun of how women's armour is shown in games, made in a couple of weeks for a uni project.

Writing: Calliope Ryder

Programming: Craig Duthie, Eloise Carr

Art: Ben Walden, Calliope Ryder 

Contact us on twitter: @callioperyder  @craig_duthie @benmwalden
